user_auth.api.permissions module

class user_auth.api.permissions.IsAuthenticated

Bases: BasePermission

Custom permission to only allow authenticated users to access the view.

has_permission(request, view)

Check if the request is a safe method (GET, HEAD, OPTIONS) or if the user is authenticated.

class user_auth.api.permissions.IsOwnerOrAdmin

Bases: BasePermission

Custom permission to only allow owners of an object or superusers to edit it.

has_object_permission(request, view, obj)

Check if the request is a safe method (GET, HEAD, OPTIONS) or if the user is the owner of the object.

user_auth.api.validators module

user_auth.api.validators.validate_email_address(email, user=None)

Validate the email address. Check if it is already in use or if it is incorrectly formatted.

user_auth.api.validators.validate_password(password, repeated_password)

Validate the password. Check if it is at least 8 characters long and contains at least one digit.

user_auth.api.validators.validate_username(username)

Validate the username. Check if it is alphanumeric and does not contain spaces.
